scripts.db:migrate: docker exec -i docvault-db psql -U docvault -d docvault < migrations/001_init.sql && docker exec -i docvault-db psql -U docvault -d docvault < migrations/002_indexes.sql
scripts.db:seed: docker exec -i docvault-db psql -U docvault -d docvault < migrations/seed.sql
scripts.test:db: pnpm db:up && pnpm db:reset && vitest run
scripts.db:reset:ci: psql "$DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -c "SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pid) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE datname = current_database();" -c "DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;" && psql "$DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f migrations/001_init.sql && psql "$DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f migrations/seed.sql
